replies.body: ive got the same problem. im on mac os x sierra. i checked the connection faq. did several repairs. but i cant login. sometimes the launcher says  "authentfication problem" sometimes it says an errror occured...the service status says everything is online..... whats the problem?? ps: forgott to mention im on euw!
It seems that EU is having login issues right now.  Bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for updates.
